item.description:
STAND UP TO THE WARMAKERS!
PROTEST NANCY PELOSI

TROOPS HOME NOW || NO ESCALATION IN AFGHANISTAN

Nancy Pelosi will be speakiing at the JFK Forum

FRIDAY, NOVEMBER 13th
4:30pm – 7:00pm

JFK School, Institute of Politics
Harvard University
79 John F. Kennedy St., Cambridge


The Democrats won a majority in the House of Representatives in 2006
on a popular mandate to bring the troops home and stop selling America
to corporate interests. As Speaker of the House Nancy Pelosi sets
priorities for Congress. Yet instead of listening to the people...

NANCY PELOSI:

• Spends billions for the occupations of Iraq and Afghanistan year after year
• Sided with the health insurance industry against single payer health care
• Ducked a vote on the Goldstone report which found war crimes in Gaza
• Granted immunity for illegal wire tapping and extraordinary rendition
• Deregulated banks, fueling the current economic crisis


Nancy Pelosi has traded the wealth and blood of the American people
for corporate profit and empire. Please join us to protest Pelosi's
visit to Boston! Everyone is welcome to bring their own message.


Sponsored by the Greater Boston Stop the Wars Coalition
http://stopthewars.or...
info@stopthewars.org
Join the STWC announcements email list and be ready to protest
whenever a warmaker visits Boston!
item.name: Protest Warmaker Nancy Pelosi
